<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Army Ant Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=549)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

An army ant swarm is a terrifying carpet of stinging insects that devours all in its path.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 20

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 15
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Army Ant Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=549)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
<trait label="Swarm" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=239" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 20 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +11; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent (imprecise) 30 feet](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** -2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +4

**Int** -5

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -4
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +13 

**Ref** +11 

**Will** +9 

</row>

**HP** 55

**Immunities**
precision, [swarm mind](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=36)

**Resistances**
bludgeoning 2, piercing 5, slashing 5

**Weaknesses**
area damage 5, splash damage 5

**Cling** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature leaves the swarm's space; **Effect** The swarm takes 1d6 damage as ants cling to the creature and continue biting, dealing 3d6 [persistent piercing damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29). High winds or immersion in water reduces the DC of the flat check to end this persistent damage to 5. Any area damage dealt to the creature destroys these clinging ants.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, climb 30 feet

**Swarming Bites** <actions string="Single Action" />  Each enemy in the swarm's space takes 3d6 piercing damage (DC 21 basic Fortitude save). A creature that fails its save against Swarming Bites becomes [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) for 1 round. If the creature attempts a [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) or [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104) action while affected, it must succeed at a DC 5 flat check or the action is lost; roll the check after spending the action, but before any effects are applied.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-125" />
name: Army Ant Swarm
